meta.title: Digg - What the Internet is talking about right now

div.a: How The FBI Hunted Down One Of Anonymous's Most Notorious Hackers

div.div: On a cold day in mid-December 2011, a hacker known as "sup_g" sat alone at his computer – invisible, or so he believed. He'd been working on the target for hours, long after the rest of his crew had logged off: an epic hack, the "digital equivalent of a nuclear bomb."

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/Us9v6S&via=Digg&text=How The FBI Hunted Down One Of Anonymous's Most Notorious Hackers

div.div: ISN'T THAT ONE OF THE SIGNS?

div.a: Mayan Apocalypse Hysteria So Widespread, NASA Publishes A Debunker

div.div: NASA had to publish a "Why the World Won't End" web page, debunking crazy white people's 2012 Mayan Armageddon hallucinations.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/TSpPNC&via=Digg&text=Mayan Apocalypse Hysteria So Widespread, NASA Publishes A Debunker

div.a: Twitter Aims To Release Photo Filters In Time For The Holidays

div.div: Forget Lo-Fi and Toaster. There may be a sepia-toned little bird under the tree this Christmas.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/RKmsMo&via=Digg&text=Twitter Aims To Release Photo Filters In Time For The Holidays

div.a: Why Facebook Will Soon Start Serving Ads On Instagram

div.div: When we think about data privacy, we normally think about a company giving or selling our info to a third party. But a single company can also circulate around our information in ways that raise similar privacy concerns.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/Ri3Vap&via=Digg&text=Why Facebook Will Soon Start Serving Ads On Instagram

div.div: Everybody has at least one: A game that, for one reason or another, just never appealed to you despite its presence on the "best game of all time" list for many people. A game that you're almost ashamed to admit to hating.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/Ri5aq2&via=Digg&text=The Most Overrated Video Games

div.a: Can Technology Make Us Eat Fewer Animals?

div.div: One of the most interesting and controversial fields in tech these days involves in-vitro meat. By growing our meat in labs from animal cells we could eventually wean ourselves off of our dependence on livestock as a protein source.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/RIoUmR&via=Digg&text=Can Technology Make Us Eat Fewer Animals?

div.a: Come February, Tweets Will Get A Wee Bit Shorter

div.div: Twitter just announced that in February it will shorten the number of characters you can use in tweets containing URLs to 118 characters.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/WODK7V&via=Digg&text=Come February, Tweets Will Get A Wee Bit Shorter

div.a: How Larry Page Built Google Into The World's Most Important Internet Company

div.div: "You may think using Google's great, but I still think it's terrible."

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/SNV7Ya&via=Digg&text=How Larry Page Built Google Into The World's Most Important Internet Company

div.div: 'I SAY, I SAY THAT'S A STEREOTYPE'

div.a: Why Does A Southern Drawl Sound Uneducated To Some?

div.div: Studies have shown that whether you are from the North or South, a Southern twang pegs the speaker as comparatively dimwitted, but also likely to be a nicer person than folks who speak like a Yankee.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/VPDFSm&via=Digg&text=Why Does A Southern Drawl Sound Uneducated To Some?

div.a: Rollerbladers Glide Down The 405 Freeway During Carmageddon II

div.div: A group of rollerbladers nabbed on the 405 Freeway finally released a video of their exploits more than two months after Carmageddon II.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/VtoAnc&via=Digg&text=Rollerbladers Glide Down The 405 Freeway During Carmageddon II

div.a: Soon Your Phone Will Be Able To Figure Out How You're Feeling

div.div: We spend a lot of time talking into our phones, but more and more we're also spending a lot of time talking to them. For the most part they tend to be pretty good at simply retrieving data that way, but soon they might be able to figure out your mood as well.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/Rhi5Zz&via=Digg&text=Soon Your Phone Will Be Able To Figure Out How You're Feeling

div.a: 'The Dark Knight Rises' Gets The Honest Trailer Treatment

div.div: Why was Bruce just hanging out in public after he’d supposedly died? He’s not exactly a low-profile dude. I’m sure Christopher Nolan framed it so the paparazzi were just off to the side.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/Vq3E0I&via=Digg&text='The Dark Knight Rises' Gets The Honest Trailer Treatment

div.a: 'Carol Of The Bells' Played Using Sounds From Inside A Photo Frame Factory

div.div: Custom photo frame maker Alphabet Photography has scored one of the first big viral marketing wins of this holiday season. In this video, they play the popular Christmas tune "Carol of the Bells" using various objects inside the warehouse in which the company’s photo frames are made.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/TO711Y&via=Digg&text='Carol Of The Bells' Played Using Sounds From Inside A Photo Frame Factory

div.a: The Best Answers To Come Out Of Ian McKellen Taking Over The Hobbit Twitter Feed

div.div: The thespian was asked questions by fans via an #AskGandalf hashtag and answered so many, the account hit their maximum for the afternoon. But don’t worry, plenty was said and it's documented here for posterity.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/UsnsS7&via=Digg&text=The Best Answers To Come Out Of Ian McKellen Taking Over The Hobbit Twitter Feed

div.a: What Judd Apatow's Kid Can Teach Us About The Twitter Generation

div.div: "Very quickly she learned how to be polite. She learned how to express herself in a way that was not cruel and judgmental of other people. … [I]t’s more about her and about our life, and people really respond to it in a big way." Apatow said.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/YLP1wj&via=Digg&text=What Judd Apatow's Kid Can Teach Us About The Twitter Generation

div.div: SO MUCH FOR BRINING BACK JOBS

div.a: Apple's US Plant Could Be Highly Automated

div.div: With Apple poised to drop a cool $100 million in US manufacturing in 2013, theories about just what a modern Apple factory could look like. As Macworld reports, the early money appears to be on intelligent machines, and lots of them.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/11UjWp4&via=Digg&text=Apple's US Plant Could Be Highly Automated

div.div: PLEASE SAY IT'S NOT THE BAGUETTES

div.a: Sperm Count Plummets For French Men

div.div: In recent decades, says a report, French sperm counts have plunged. What's behind this worrying phenomenon?

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/Rg2JEH&via=Digg&text=Sperm Count Plummets For French Men

div.a: How Much Do The Mad Men Really Drink?

div.div: Here's the data on the boozing habits of everyone's favorite ad men.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/YRWsAI&via=Digg&text=How Much Do The Mad Men Really Drink?

div.div: CONAN DOING HIS BEST CHARLIE ROSE

div.a: Watch Conan O'Brien Have A Serious Conversation With Cookie Monster Fan Nate Silver

div.div: Saturday mornings are sluggish and awful and you're just going to sleep in today anyway, so why not start your day with a serious conversation between Conan O'Brien and noted Cookie Monster fan, and occasional analytic genius, Nate Silver.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/YXWWFM&via=Digg&text=Watch Conan O'Brien Have A Serious Conversation With Cookie Monster Fan Nate Silver

div.a: Air Force May Be Developing Stealth Drones In Secret

div.div: There might be evidence of new stealth drones under development by Lockheed Martin and Northrop Grumman — the latter potentially armed, and both drawing on classified funds. If these robots are real, the Air Force’s drone era is not only not ending — it’s barely begun.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/11X6YH3&via=Digg&text=Air Force May Be Developing Stealth Drones In Secret

div.a: What Happens To Your Facebook Profile After You Die?

div.div: Increasingly, announcements and subsequent mourning occur on social media. Facebook, with 1 billion users and detailed, self-submitted profiles, was created to connect the living. But it has become the world's largest site of memorials for the dead.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/VoFTpC&via=Digg&text=What Happens To Your Facebook Profile After You Die?
